name: foundryvtt-terrain-randomizer
description: A set of macros for playing with The Terrain Randomizer book with automated functions

scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp ./terrain-randomizer.js dist/ && cp ./README.md dist/ && cp ./CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cp ./LICENSE.md dist/ && cp ./module.json dist/ && cp ./THANKS.txt dist/ && cp -r ./packs dist/
scripts.copyWin: mkdir dist && copy module.json dist && copy terrain-randomizer.js dist && copy README.md dist && copy CHANGELOG.md dist && copy LICENSE.md dist && copy module.json dist && copy THANKS.txt dist && xcopy /Y /I packs dist\packs

author: JeansenVaars (Saif Ellafi)
